00025 VhdlComponentInstance::VhdlComponentInstance( VhdlGenerator2* parent,
00026                                                                                          VhdlComponentDeclaration* compDeclaration,
00027                                                                                          const QString& instanceName,
00028                                                                                          const QString& viewName,
00029                                                                                          const QString& description):
00030 QObject(parent), 
00031 compDeclaration_(compDeclaration),
00032 instanceName_(instanceName),
00033 typeName_(compDeclaration->typeName()),
00034 architecture_(),
00035 description_(description),
00036 defaultPortConnections_(),
00037 genericMap_(),
00038 portMap_() {
00039 
00040         connect(this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00041                 parent, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00042         connect(this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00043                 parent, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00044 
00045         LibraryInterface* handler = parent->handler();
00046         Q_ASSERT(handler);
00047 
00048         // if view name is not specified
00049         if (viewName.isEmpty()) {
00050                 return;
00051         }
00052 
00053         QSharedPointer<Component> component = compDeclaration_->componentModel();
00054         Q_ASSERT(component);
00055         
00056         // set the entity name that is used
00057         typeName_ = component->getEntityName(viewName);
00058         compDeclaration_->setEntityName(typeName_);
00059 
00060         // get the architecture name for this instance
00061         architecture_ = component->getArchitectureName(viewName);
00062 
00063         // get the default values of the in and inout ports
00064         defaultPortConnections_ = component->getPortDefaultValues();
00065         QMap<QString, QString> tempDefaults;
00066         for (QMap<QString, QString>::iterator i = defaultPortConnections_.begin();
00067                 i != defaultPortConnections_.end(); ++i) {
00068 
00069                 // get the VLNVs of the abstraction definitions for the port
00070                 QMultiMap<QString, VLNV> absDefs = component->getInterfaceAbsDefForPort(i.key());
00071                 for (QMultiMap<QString, VLNV>::Iterator j = absDefs.begin();
00072                         j != absDefs.end(); ++j) {
00073 
00074                         // if the abs def does not exist in the library
00075                         if (handler->getDocumentType(j.value()) != VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION) {
00076                                 if (!tempDefaults.contains(i.key()))
00077                                         tempDefaults.insert(i.key(), i.value());
00078                                 continue;
00079                         }
00080 
00081                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler->getModel(j.value());
00082                         QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition> absDef = libComp.staticCast<AbstractionDefinition>();
00083 
00084                         if (absDef->hasDefaultValue(j.key())) {
00085                                 tempDefaults.insert(i.key(), QString::number(absDef->getDefaultValue(j.key())));
00086                                 break;
00087                         }
00088                         else {
00089                                 if (!tempDefaults.contains(i.key()))
00090                                         tempDefaults.insert(i.key(), i.value());
00091                                 continue;
00092                         }
00093                 }
00094         }
00095         defaultPortConnections_ = tempDefaults;
00096 }

00098 VhdlComponentInstance::~VhdlComponentInstance() {
00099 }

00101 void VhdlComponentInstance::write( QTextStream& stream ) const {
00102         // if instance has description
00103         if (!description_.isEmpty()) {
00104                 stream << "\t";
00105                 VhdlGeneral::writeDescription(description_, stream, QString("\t"));
00106         }
00107 
00108         // write the instance name and type
00109         stream << "\t" << instanceName_ << " : " << typeName_;
00110 
00111         // if architecture has been defined
00112         if (!architecture_.isEmpty()) {
00113                 stream << "(" << architecture_ << ")";
00114         }
00115         stream << endl;
00116 
00117         // print the generic map
00118 
00119         if (!genericMap_.isEmpty()) {
00120                 stream << "\t\tgeneric map (" << endl;
00121                 for (QMap<QString, QString>::const_iterator i = genericMap_.begin(); i != genericMap_.end(); ++i) {
00122                         stream << "\t\t\t" << i.key() << " => " << i.value();
00123 
00124                         // if this is not the last generic to print
00125                         if (i + 1 != genericMap_.end()) {
00126                                 stream << "," << endl;
00127                         }
00128                 }
00129                 stream << endl << "\t\t)" << endl;
00130         }
00131 
00132         // print the port map
00133 
00134         if (!portMap_.isEmpty()) {
00135                 stream << "\t\tport map (" << endl;
00136                 for (QMap<VhdlPortMap, VhdlPortMap>::const_iterator i = portMap_.begin(); i != portMap_.end(); ++i) {
00137                         stream << "\t\t\t";
00138                         i.key().write(stream);
00139                         stream << " => ";
00140                         i.value().write(stream);
00141 
00142                         // if this is not the last port map to print
00143                         if (i + 1 != portMap_.end()) {
00144                                 stream << "," << endl;
00145                         }
00146                 }
00147                 stream << endl << "\t\t);" << endl;
00148         }
00149 }

00152         return instanceName_;

00155 void VhdlComponentInstance::addPortMap( const VhdlConnectionEndPoint& endPoint, 
00156                                                                            const QString& signalName ) {
00157 
00158         // create a map for the port of this instance
00159         VhdlPortMap instancePort(endPoint.portName(), endPoint.portLeft(), endPoint.portRight());
00160 
00161         // create a map for the defaultValue/top port that is connected
00162         VhdlPortMap signalMapping(signalName, endPoint.signalLeft(), endPoint.signalRight());
00163 
00164         addMapping(instancePort, signalMapping);
00165 }
00166 
00167 void VhdlComponentInstance::addPortMap( const QString& portName,
00168                                                                            int portLeft, 
00169                                                                            int portRight,
00170                                                                            const QString& signalName,
00171                                                                            int signalLeft, 
00172                                                                            int signalRight ) {
00173         
00174         // create a map for the port of this instance
00175         VhdlPortMap instancePort(portName, portLeft, portRight);
00176 
00177         // create a map for the defaultValue/top port that is connected
00178         VhdlPortMap signalMapping(signalName, signalLeft, signalRight);
00179 
00180         addMapping(instancePort, signalMapping);
00181 }
00182 
00183 void VhdlComponentInstance::addMapping(const VhdlPortMap &instancePort,
00184                                                                            const VhdlPortMap &signalMapping ) {
00185         // if the same bits of port are already connected
00186         if (portMap_.contains(instancePort)) {
00187                 VhdlPortMap previousValue = portMap_.value(instancePort);
00188 
00189                 // inform user that the mapping for those bits already existed.
00190                 emit noticeMessage(tr("The instance %1:%2 already contains mapping "
00191                         "\"%3 => %4\"").arg(
00192                         typeName_).arg(
00193                         instanceName_).arg(
00194                         instancePort.toString()).arg(
00195                         previousValue.toString()));
00196 
00197                 // inform user that the new mapping is also added
00198                 emit noticeMessage(tr("Instance %1:%2 now has also port mapping "
00199                         "\"%3 => %4\"").arg(
00200                         typeName_).arg(
00201                         instanceName_).arg(
00202                         instancePort.toString()).arg(
00203                         signalMapping.toString()));
00204         }
00205 
00206         portMap_.insertMulti(instancePort, signalMapping);
00207 }
00208 
00209 void VhdlComponentInstance::addGenericMap( const QString& genericName,
00210                                                                                   const QString& genericValue ) {
00211                                                                                           
00212         // if the generics already contains a mapping for the generic
00213         if (genericMap_.contains(genericName)) {
00214                 QString oldValue = genericMap_.value(genericName);
00215                 
00216                 // print a notification to user that the previous value for the generic
00217                 // is overwritten with new value
00218                 emit noticeMessage(tr("The instance %1:%2 already contained generic mapping"
00219                         " \"%3 => %4\" but \"%3 => %5\" replaced it.").arg(
00220                         typeName_).arg(
00221                         instanceName_).arg(
00222                         genericName).arg(
00223                         oldValue).arg(
00224                         genericValue));
00225         }
00226 
00227         genericMap_.insert(genericName, genericValue);
00228 }
00229 
00230 bool VhdlComponentInstance::hasConnection( const QString& portName ) {
00231         for (QMap<VhdlPortMap, VhdlPortMap>::iterator i = portMap_.begin();
00232                 i != portMap_.end(); ++i) {
00233                         
00234                         // if the mapping is for port with same name
00235                         if (i.key().name().compare(portName, Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0) {
00236                                 return true;
00237                         }
00238         }
00239 
00240         // not port mapping for named port was found
00241         return false;
00242 }
00243 
00244 void VhdlComponentInstance::useDefaultsForOtherPorts() {
00245         // check all ports that have a connection
00246         for (QMap<VhdlPortMap, VhdlPortMap>::iterator i = portMap_.begin();
00247                 i != portMap_.end(); ++i) {
00248 
00249                         defaultPortConnections_.remove(i.key().name());
00250         }
00251 
00252         // now default values remain only for ports with no connections at all
00253 
00254         // go through each default port value
00255         for (QMap<QString, QString>::iterator i = defaultPortConnections_.begin();
00256                 i != defaultPortConnections_.end(); ++i) {
00257                 
00258                 VhdlPortMap port(i.key());
00259                 VhdlPortMap defaultValue(i.value());
00260                 addMapping(port, defaultValue);
00261         }
00262 }

00268 VLNV VhdlComponentInstance::vlnv() const {
